Header: Acceptance of postal vote applications for the ElpitiyaPradeshiya Sabha elections has begun
Content: Elections Commissioner General Saman Sri Ratnayake says that acceptance of postal vote applications for the ElpitiyaPradeshiya Sabha elections has begun. The Elections Commissioner General added that the deadline for accepting applications for the postal voting will be the 13th of September. He urged all the prospective applicants to send their applications before the deadline. The applications should be duly filled and certified before sending to the returning officer of Galle.
